item.description: Manual Link to heading Top Scene Link to heading To start the application, press the “Talk” button, and to set the OpenAI API key, press the “OpenAI API Setting”. OpenAI API Setting Scene Link to heading Enter your OpenAI API key and press the “Register” button when you are done. Chat Scene Link to heading Answer the question from Chatify. Play Scene Link to heading Press the button to play music.

Privacy Policy Link to heading 1. Acquisition of user information Link to heading This application acquires the user’s Spotify remote control playback rights. 2. Use of User Information Link to heading For integration with Spotify. 3. Provision of User Information to Third Parties Link to heading This application will not provide the user’s personal information to any third party. 4. Contact Information Link to heading Please contact us if you have any questions.
